description: Try this Caesar salad with a tasty twist. Grilling the lettuce gives it a smoky flavour, caramelising the outside while the inside stays crisp.
name: Grilled Caesar Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Woolworths sourdough baguette, thinly sliced diagonally

recipeInstructions.text: Place yoghurt, anchovy, mustard, two-thirds of the parmesan, zest and lemon juice in a small bowl and whisk until combined. Refrigerate until required.

Heat a chargrill pan over medium-high heat. Spray both sides of bread with oil. Grill for 2 minutes on each side or until golden and crisp. Spray cut-sides of lettuce with oil. Cook, cut-sides down, for 2 minutes or until charred and slightly wilted. Transfer lettuce to bowls.
Cook bacon for 2 minutes on each side or until golden and crisp. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate.
Arrange bread, roughly chopped bacon and egg around lettuce. Drizzle with yoghurt dressing and sprinkle over remaining parmesan and chives. Season with pepper and serve.
